definition: A passionate enthusiast who ardently supports and follows a popular sport, particularly the one involving a spherical object and players using their feet to score goals. This term is commonly employed to describe individuals who exhibit strong dedication and enthusiasm towards this sport, often attending matches, cheering for their favorite teams, and engaging in discussions or debates related to the sport.

examples.english: I am a big football fan.

examples.german: Er ist seit seiner Kindheit ein Fußballfan.
examples.english: He has been a football fan since his childhood.

examples.german: Sie geht regelmäßig zu Fußballspielen und ist ein großer Fußballfan.
examples.english: She regularly attends football matches and is a big football fan.

examples.german: Als Fußballfan verfolge ich alle Spiele meines Lieblingsteams.
examples.english: As a football fan, I follow all the matches of my favorite team.

examples.german: Die Fußballfans jubelten lautstark, als ihr Team das Tor erzielte.
examples.english: The football fans cheered loudly when their team scored a goal.
